thread.section_title: Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: home away from home
thread.title_full: home away from home - Review of Le Royal Monceau-Raffles Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: traveler_de
title: home away from home
text: just loving this hotel. very stylish and chic. perfect place for someone who is looking to combine art with great food. the Pierre Herme breakfast items are to die for. service is on point and the rooms are beautifully appointed. location is perfect for someone who is looking to be more part of Paris' residential living and not being right in the middle of everything. but, all the attraction and shopping is within easy reach.
